Keccak-256 hash of the withdraw request.","params":{"request":"The request structure."},"return":"Keccak-256 EIP712 hash of the withdraw request."},"getTransferRequestHash((address,uint256[],address[],uint256))":{"details":"Calculates Keccak-256 hash of the transfer request.","params":{"request":"The request structure."},"return":"Keccak-256 EIP712 hash of the transfer request."},"getWithdrawCrossChainRequestHash((address,uint256,string,address,uint256,uint256))":{"details":"Calculates Keccak-256 hash of the crosschain withdraw request.","params":{"request":"The request structure."},"return":"Keccak-256 EIP712 hash of the crosschain withdraw request."},"pause()":{"details":"Called by a pauser to pause, triggers stopped state."},"paused()":{"details":"Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise."},"unpause()":{"details":"Called by a pauser to unpause, returns to normal state."}}},"userdoc":{"methods":{"Pause()":{"notice":"Pause the majority of functionalities of CRCL. Only WhitelistAdmin (DEX) have the access permission.      * Note that `requestForceWithdraw` and `forceWithdraw` is not subject to pause"},"Resume()":{"notice":"Resume all paused functionalities of Boomflow. Only WhitelistAdmin (DEX) have the access permission."},"forceWithdraw(address)":{"notice":"Force withdraw all msg.sender's CRCL token to recipient's ERC20 token. The function acknowledges the request and records the request time.      * Emits a {Withdraw} event indicating the amount withdrawn."},"requestForceWithdraw()":{"notice":"Request for a force withdraw of all sender's CRCL token. The function acknowledges the request and records the request time.      * Emits a {ScheduleWithdraw} event indicating the withdraw has been scheduled."},"transferFor((address,uint256[],address[],uint256),bytes)":{"notice":"Transfer tokens from one sender to a list of recipients according to a list of amounts. Only WhitelistAdmin have the access permission. Emits an {Transfer} event indicating the amount transferred.      * Requirements: - `request.userAddress` cannot be zero address. - `request.amounts` and `request.recipients` must have the same length."},"transferFrom(address,address,uint256)":{"notice":"Transfer the amount of token from sender to recipient. Only WhitelistedRoles (WhitelistAdmin, Boomflow) have the access permission. Emits an {Transfer} event indicating the amount transferred.      * Requirements: - `sender` and `recipient` cannot be the zero address. - `sender` must have a balance of at least `amount`."},"withdraw((address,uint256,address,bool,uint256),bytes)":{"notice":"Withdraw the amount of token from sender's CRCL to recipient's ERC777 asset. Only WhitelistAdmin (DEX) have the access permission. The function will atomically perform the following operations:      *      1. Validate the user signature     2. Burn `request.amount` of CRCL token from `request.userAddress`     3. Transfer equal amount of ERC777 token from the contract address to `request.recipient`      * The ERC777 token emits a {Transfer} event indicating the amount transferred. The CRCL token emits a {Withdraw} event indicating the amount withdrawn.      * Requirements: - The request hash has to be unique. - The `request.isCrosschain` is False."},"withdrawCrossChain((address,uint256,string,address,uint256,uint256),bytes)":{"notice":"Withdraw the amount of token from sender's CRCL to recipient's crosschain asset. Only WhitelistAdmin (DEX) have the access permission. The function will atomically perform the following operations:      *      1. Validate the user signature     2. Burn `request.amount` of CRCL token from `request.userAddress`     3. Burn equal amount of ERC777 token from the contract address      * Note that For the full-fledged crosschain withdraw, we are depending on Custodian counterparts to perform the actual crosschain operations      * The ERC777 token emits a {Burned} event indicating the amount withdrawn. The CRCL token emits a {Transfer} to null address event indicating the amount withdrawn.      * Requirements: - The request hash has to be unique. - The `request.isCrosschain` is True."}}}},"settings":{"compilationTarget":{"/Users/kang/work/boomflow-contract/contracts/crc-l/CRCL.sol":"CRCL"},"evmVersion":"istanbul","libraries":{},"optimizer":{"enabled":true,"runs":1000},"remappings":[]},"sources":{"/Users/kang/work/boomflow-contract/contracts/ERC777/ITokenBase.sol":{"keccak256":"0x7568cb63f3592e2b46e645882bac7a94260d09206d368ba9916689be23dc25eb","urls":["bzz-raw://9d16f50dcbcb77a4814be5de12da176bcffec2306a4def84e7907cd2aa2d4aad","dweb:/ipfs/QmfU4m8UMhsan8n7d6xXYTZPcYkDh9VTLEp5GL1NqGgtV1"]},"/Users/kang/work/boomflow-contract/contracts/ERC777/IWrappedCfx.sol":{"keccak256":"0xdbe4450c91c38c601ea51e2818715d9683c2014801095ea4c5a890c2a518ddde","urls":["bzz-raw://aefb9600430a4c8506995dbf57f75c3ccd4286bce9e2820512ef7de3a0f0ccb6","dweb:/ipfs/QmTqY14nyoZePoKnUg9PY1fsjQMGA9vmdaopW14KLZSRhn"]},"/Users/kang/work/boomflow-contract/contracts/boomflow/libs/LibSignatureValidator.sol":{"keccak256":"0x36227a2482623841dc33a65db9ca22af3ec8cf263b78546ca44ce952e4aa096f","urls":["bzz-raw://ded11e336c25932e2cd3780cf88600fe27570af6fb33ccfb3535062baceb3d0c","dweb:/ipfs/QmaNeBxB9xVncbGA67ZPpMzBFM8E1HMWaQr8wJipo7qzHD"]},"/Users/kang/work/boomflow-contract/contracts/crc-l/CRCL.sol":{"keccak256":"0x0e41351e26cd31ab457832939a1ac96b3bf97eb0a13bb4c94e1229ea2f90f31b","urls":["bzz-raw://7c24c50b121e137818fd9206a01c79f1731ca5291e3dd398df55c00ce5482d43","dweb:/ipfs/QmdHNXHP71U1eGpLxrsuvfu9ahag7iGFMDghN4AijBN8St"]},"/Users/kang/work/boomflow-contract/contracts/crc-l/ICRCL.sol":{"keccak256":"0x23d07c5445648f59cab7de1c077917ac54f5ec28047e8f4df0e0abf745b30c76","urls":["bzz-raw://503e3c8f4ce352c7762cb424f3556cea3663e097a5c5f9ba86c3dccd738364cb","dweb:/ipfs/QmZoLSzUZaAjNiific6fFeqyB7cpuoPRREsouy9KsttvKs"]},"/Users/kang/work/boomflow-contract/contracts/crc-l/TimeLock.sol":{"keccak256":"0xa19494e46fcd31a8e5972380534f60d6ba844d390539af9ff5595b91eb24dce1","urls":["bzz-raw://37c798fceb047e20363284b0a181f45292fe438e9ebdb4658144fcabc9b9e577","dweb:/ipfs/QmWw33Ruuv7icf7qnAPLPijKKdoLH9PKvNNWd nodes.documentation:
Transfer the amount of token from sender to recipient.
Only WhitelistedRoles (WhitelistAdmin, Boomflow) have the access permission.
Emits an {Transfer} event indicating the amount transferred.

     * Requirements:
- `sender` and `recipient` cannot be the zero address.
- `sender` must have a balance of at least `amount`.
nodes.name: transferFrom

nodes.documentation:
Transfer tokens from one sender to a list of recipients according to a list of amounts.
Only WhitelistAdmin have the access permission.
Emits an {Transfer} event indicating the amount transferred.

     * Requirements:
- `request.userAddress` cannot be zero address.
- `request.amounts` and `request.recipients` must have the same length.
nodes.name: transferFor

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "CRCL: withdraw amount exceeds CRCL balance"

arguments.value: CRCL: withdraw amount exceeds CRCL balance

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "CRCL: withdraw amount exceeds CRCL balance"

nodes.documentation:
Withdraw the amount of token from sender's CRCL to recipient's ERC777 asset.
Only WhitelistAdmin (DEX) have the access permission.
The function will atomically perform the following operations:

     *      1. Validate the user signature
     2. Burn `request.amount` of CRCL token from `request.userAddress`
     3. Transfer equal amount of ERC777 token from the contract address to `request.recipient`

     * The ERC777 token emits a {Transfer} event indicating the amount transferred.
The CRCL token emits a {Withdraw} event indicating the amount withdrawn.

     * Requirements:
- The request hash has to be unique.
- The `request.isCrosschain` is False.
nodes.name: withdraw

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "CRCL: withdraw amount exceeds CRCL balance"

arguments.value: CRCL: withdraw amount exceeds CRCL balance

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "CRCL: withdraw amount exceeds CRCL balance"

nodes.documentation:
Withdraw the amount of token from sender's CRCL to recipient's crosschain asset.
Only WhitelistAdmin (DEX) have the access permission.
The function will atomically perform the following operations:

     *      1. Validate the user signature
     2. Burn `request.amount` of CRCL token from `request.userAddress`
     3. Burn equal amount of ERC777 token from the contract address

     * Note that For the full-fledged crosschain withdraw, we are depending
on Custodian counterparts to perform the actual crosschain operations

     * The ERC777 token emits a {Burned} event indicating the amount withdrawn.
The CRCL token emits a {Transfer} to null address event indicating the amount withdrawn.

     * Requirements:
- The request hash has to be unique.
- The `request.isCrosschain` is True.
nodes.name: withdrawCrossChain

nodes.documentation:
Request for a force withdraw of all sender's CRCL token.
The function acknowledges the request and records the request time.

     * Emits a {ScheduleWithdraw} event indicating the withdraw has been scheduled.
nodes.name: requestForceWithdraw

nodes.documentation:
Force withdraw all msg.sender's CRCL token to recipient's ERC20 token.
The function acknowledges the request and records the request time.

     * Emits a {Withdraw} event indicating the amount withdrawn.
nodes.name: forceWithdraw

nodes.documentation:
Pause the majority of functionalities of CRCL.
Only WhitelistAdmin (DEX) have the access permission.

     * Note that `requestForceWithdraw` and `forceWithdraw` is not subject to pause

nodes.documentation:
Resume all paused functionalities of Boomflow.
Only WhitelistAdmin (DEX) have the access permission.

pause().details: Called by a pauser to pause, triggers stopped state.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

unpause().details: Called by a pauser to unpause, returns to normal state.

Pause().notice: Pause the majority of functionalities of CRCL. Only WhitelistAdmin (DEX) have the access permission.      * Note that `requestForceWithdraw` and `forceWithdraw` is not subject to pause

Resume().notice: Resume all paused functionalities of Boomflow. Only WhitelistAdmin (DEX) have the access permission.

forceWithdraw(address).notice: Force withdraw all msg.sender's CRCL token to recipient's ERC20 token. The function acknowledges the request and records the request time.      * Emits a {Withdraw} event indicating the amount withdrawn.

requestForceWithdraw().notice: Request for a force withdraw of all sender's CRCL token. The function acknowledges the request and records the request time.      * Emits a {ScheduleWithdraw} event indicating the withdraw has been scheduled.

transferFor((address,uint256[],address[].notice: Transfer tokens from one sender to a list of recipients according to a list of amounts. Only WhitelistAdmin have the access permission. Emits an {Transfer} event indicating the amount transferred.      * Requirements: - `request.userAddress` cannot be zero address. - `request.amounts` and `request.recipients` must have the same length.

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).notice: Transfer the amount of token from sender to recipient. Only WhitelistedRoles (WhitelistAdmin, Boomflow) have the access permission. Emits an {Transfer} event indicating the amount transferred.      * Requirements: - `sender` and `recipient` cannot be the zero address. - `sender` must have a balance of at least `amount`.

withdraw((address,uint256,address,bool,u.notice: Withdraw the amount of token from sender's CRCL to recipient's ERC777 asset. Only WhitelistAdmin (DEX) have the access permission. The function will atomically perform the following operations:      *      1. Validate the user signature     2. Burn `request.amount` of CRCL token from `request.userAddress`     3. Transfer equal amount of ERC777 token from the contract address to `request.recipient`      * The ERC777 token emits a {Transfer} event indicating the amount transferred. The CRCL token emits a {Withdraw} event indicating the amount withdrawn.      * Requirements: - The request hash has to be unique. - The `request.isCrosschain` is False.

withdrawCrossChain((address,uint256,stri.notice: Withdraw the amount of token from sender's CRCL to recipient's crosschain asset. Only WhitelistAdmin (DEX) have the access permission. The function will atomically perform the following operations:      *      1. Validate the user signature     2. Burn `request.amount` of CRCL token from `request.userAddress`     3. Burn equal amount of ERC777 token from the contract address      * Note that For the full-fledged crosschain withdraw, we are depending on Custodian counterparts to perform the actual crosschain operations      * The ERC777 token emits a {Burned} event indicating the amount withdrawn. The CRCL token emits a {Transfer} to null address event indicating the amount withdrawn.      * Requirements: - The request hash has to be unique. - The `request.isCrosschain` is True.
